column2: "Your report has been accepted. The license application is also all in order. We look forward to your continued success."
"Well, now that we've got all the official stuff out of the way, let me add a few words of my own."
"Mags can think and act for themselves. Each one is unique, just like you and me, as they develop based on how their owner treats them."
"I don't know the specifics of how Mags evolve, but an ARKS operative would probably be able to tell you more."
"From here on in, your Mag will share your fate. Take good care of it."
"「マグライセンス」を入手しました。"
"Hans has issued a client order.  Hans is in front of the west Quest Counter in the Campship."
"Amelin has issued a client order.  Amelin is in Monument Plaza in the shop area."
"Echo has issued a client order.  Echo is at the ARKS Counter in the Campship."

"イオに
クライアントオーダーが発生しました。

イオは
ショップエリア・モニュメント広場にいます。"
"『マグの装備の仕方』について"

"マグの装備の仕方について説明します。

マグを取得しても
装備しなければ効果はありません。
メニューからマグの一覧を表示し、
任意のマグを選択し「装備する」を選びましょう。

マグが装備され、パラメーターの補正や
戦闘支援など様々な効果を
受けることが出来ます。

ペット装備時にマグは姿を隠していますが
パラメーター補正や支援効果は全て
通常通りに受けることが出来ます。"
